title: Time Eater

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Select a player at night. During the following day, whenever a vote is placed for that player, the amount of time remaining until the day ends is cut in half, and everyone is notified that this occurred.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Whenever a vote is placed for you, the amount of time remaining until the day ends is cut in half, and everyone is notified that this occurred.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure that there are at least 3 days in the game in which nobody is hanged. (Day 1 does not count toward this goal.)

desc:
Post 2463
*All this accusing is making me hungry.*
